title: How to Do a 3D Flower Bun

steps.headline: Pull your hair into a high ponytail and secure with a hair tie.
Divide your hair into 4 equal section, laying each section between one of your fingers on your right hand.
steps.description:
The hair should lay like this:
Strand number 1 is outside the pinky finger
Strand number 2 is between pinky and ring finger
Strand number 3 is between ring and middle finger
Strand number 4 is between middle and index finger

steps.headline: Take the index finger on your left hand and use it to hook strand number 3.
steps.description: It should now lay between your pointer finger (index finger) and your middle finger.

steps.headline: Take your middle finger and hook strand number 1.
steps.description: This will now lay between your middle and ring finger.

steps.headline: Take the last two pieces and twist them once (so they cross over each other).
steps.description: Place them so Strand number 4 lays between your ring finger and pinky finger, and Strand number 2 lays outside your pinky finger.

steps.headline: All strands should now be sitting in your left hand and will be numbered 1-4 from left to right.
Take your right index finger and hook strand number 2.
steps.description: This will now lay between your index and middle finger.

steps.headline: Take your middle finger and hook strand number 4.
steps.description: This will now lay between your middle and ring finger.

steps.headline: With the last two remaining strands, do a half twist so they cross.
steps.description: Then place them so strand number 1 now lays between your ring and pinky finger with strand number 3, laying outside your pinky finger.

steps.headline: Repeat this whole process until you run out of hair and secure with an elastic.
Go back and pancake the braid (all four sides) by tugging the elbows of the braid without pulling the hair out of the braid.
Wrap the braid in the form of bun .
steps.description: You will want to place bobby pins  as you wrap the braid.

steps.headline: Tuck the ends with bobby pins so they are out of sight.

text:
Pull your hair into a high ponytail and secure with a hair tie.  Divide your hair into 4 equal section, laying each section between one of your fingers on your right hand. The hair should lay like this:
Strand number 1 is outside the pinky finger
Strand number 2 is between pinky and ring finger
Strand number 3 is between ring and middle finger
Strand number 4 is between middle and index finger Take the index finger on your left hand and use it to hook strand number 3. It should now lay between your pointer finger (index finger) and your middle finger. Take your middle finger and hook strand number 1. This will now lay between your middle and ring finger. Take the last two pieces and twist them once (so they cross over each other). Place them so Strand number 4 lays between your ring finger and pinky finger, and Strand number 2 lays outside your pinky finger. All strands should now be sitting in your left hand and will be numbered 1-4 from left to right.  Take your right index finger and hook strand number 2. This will now lay between your index and middle finger. Take your middle finger and hook strand number 4. This will now lay between your middle and ring finger. With the last two remaining strands, do a half twist so they cross. Then place them so strand number 1 now lays between your ring and pinky finger with strand number 3, laying outside your pinky finger. Repeat this whole process until you run out of hair and secure with an elastic.  Go back and pancake the braid (all four sides) by tugging the elbows of the braid without pulling the hair out of the braid.  Wrap the braid in the form of bun . You will want to place bobby pins  as you wrap the braid. Tuck the ends with bobby pins so they are out of sight.  Finished!
